definition: housewife/woman of senior authority in a household/the lady of the house/hostess
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: I think my mother is a good housewife.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我媽媽是一個非常棒的家庭主婦。

sentences.english: Wealth is a good servant, a very bad mistress.
sentences.chinese: 財富是個好僕人，也是一個壞主婦。

sentences.english: I am willing to be a good housewife even if I always enjoy modern point of view.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我崇尚前衛思想，可我願意做個好主婦呢。

sentences.english: The saying means no matter how skillful a housewife is, she can't cook a meal without rice literally.
sentences.chinese: 本義爲再巧的主婦，要是沒有米也做不出飯來。

sentences.english: If the housewife sleep, the basket become empty.
Her matronly fame was trodden under all men's feet.
sentences.chinese: 她那主婦的聲名任憑所有的人踐踏在腳下。

sentences.english: Housewives were picking out vegetables and bargaining with the sellers.
sentences.chinese: 家庭主婦們一邊挑選蔬菜，一邊和賣主討價還加。

sentences.english: Will you be a housewife or a househusband ?
sentences.chinese: 你會成爲家庭主婦或主男嗎？

sentences.english: My mother's name is Irma Hill. She is also a farmer and a housewife.
sentences.chinese: 我的母親厄瑪希爾也是農民，並是家庭主婦。

sentences.english: As a housewife, she has to do almost all the housework.
sentences.chinese: 作爲家庭主婦，她幾乎做了全部家務。

sentences.english: Corporatist family polices are based on gender differences and ethos of the housewife .
sentences.chinese: 組合主義家庭維持治安根據主婦的性別和性格。

sentences.english: Her mother is a thrifty housewife.
sentences.chinese: 她母親是一個勤儉的主婦。

sentences.english: The mother is usually the homemaker.
A distressed mistress has suppressed the witnessed stiffness of the harness.
sentences.chinese: 一個痛苦的主婦抑制了有旁證的玩具的硬度。

sentences.english: Look at the recent "Desperate Housewives", a film of life of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 最近再看《瘋狂主婦》，一部美國的生活片。

definition: to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
